pages.title: Wraiths
pages.text: This Wraith appears when players or villagers fall from a great height and perish. Its unique soul flame can be harvested.

pages.title: The Wraith Ritual
pages.text: Craft yourself a ritual note using the provided recipe. This will explain how to properly setup and preform a $(d)Wraith Ritual$().

pages.title: Preforming the Ritual
pages.text: Please note that all candles in a ritual must be lit with the corresponding color of soul flames. This means you must kill and collect the souls of all 6 Wraiths to perform this ritual.

pages.title: Ritual Completion
pages.text: Once you have completed the ritual and fought off whatever Hell throws at you, you will be rewarded with some of these Wings.

pages.title: Divine Wings
pages.text: By coating the impure wings with the blessings given off by blessed wax, you can craft a pair of $(d)Divine Wings$(). These are used in one of the ways to achieve flight.
